description.narrative: Output 2.3. Adolescent development: By 2020, improved access of adolescents to information, life skills and essential services to reduce their vulnerability to HIV, teenage pregnancy and violence., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Cross-Sectoral Adolescent Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2. By 2020, an effective and efficient well-resourced formal and non-formal quality education system that is inclusive, relevant and accessible to all boys and girls with increased school retention, completion and achievement rates.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.3. Adolescent development: By 2020, improved access of adolescents to information, life skills and essential services to reduce their vulnerability to HIV, teenage pregnancy and violence.

description.narrative: Activities contributing to the output were on track, however due to COVID-19 activities were suspended, which has constrained progress. Certain activities have been adapted, leading to the achievement of certain results for adolescents. In response to the pandemic C4D platforms have been strengthened to pass key messages on to adolescents. Due to school closure other activities have been suspended. Before the pandemic progress was made towards establishing key partnerships and strengthening cross sectorial coordination to provide in-school and out of school adolescents with space for participation, transferable skills, formal/informal learning pathways, and to link them with the world of work. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:30/07/2020
